content: **knitted santa hat for babies in drops air the piece is worked in stocking stitch and rib sizes 0/1 month 2 years theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ai-003-by yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months - 2 years fits head size approx 34/38 40/42 42/44 44/46 48/50 cm length approx 30-34-38-40-40 cm with ribbed edge folded up **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50-50-50-50 g colour 25 raspberry 50-50-50-50-50 g colour 01 off white **knitting gauge ** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
